name: Doodle's Universe
description:
Doodle's Universe


the world seen from a doodle's perspective seems huge. 

What if doodles are alive? they might have dreams, right?

Play as a little doodle across 7 levels and get to the spaceship in time, you only have 5 minutes.
beware of the tenis ball shooters or maybe you'll be late to fly across the universe.


A game by:    Instagram    -    Heart_Crafted_Games
Music and voice by:    Instagram - izzirivers
